name: r/Place 'amogi' finder
description:
Self-challenge do design an algorithm to find every hidden 'amogi' (Among Us creature) in the collaborative project r/place 2022.

The code instantly loads and processes a very large pixel art image and analyzes it pixel by pixel, so it will just display a blank page for a while and then displays the result.
short_description: Self-challenge do design an algorithm to find every hidden 'amogi' in r/place 2022.
